exposition-2: Taking regular WordPress sites to the next level.
rising-action-2: My mission was simple. Designing websites with Adobe XD, and subsequently developing them with WordPress, also adding CSS and JavaScript code to them.
climax-2: Being primarily a React developer, my knowledge of CSS and JavaScript has been found to be useful in countering the inflexibility of some themes and plug-ins, allowing me to have full control over their layout, style and functionalities.
falling-action-2: Working in the largest studio in Ragusa taught me to respect the development timelines, to present the works to the clients, communicating directly with them and always trying to find a compromise between the client's requests and the consequent development of them. Working in a team of 16 people, also taught how to manage communication efficiently between the various departments of the studio.
denouement-2: I gained work experience with website design, CSS and JavaScript.
